title: Conservation of momentum - pieces of exploding toy

content.question: A toy is made up of four pieces, with the relative masses indicated in the top-view figures shown. The toy is initially at rest on a horizontal surface, as shown in Figure <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>. A mechanism internal to the toy causes the four pieces to move apart, as shown in Figure <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>. Friction between the pieces of the toy and the surface is negligible. Which of the following indicates an equation or set of equations that correctly describes the magnitudes of the momenta of the four pieces?
